nodes.description: 1999年莫斯科和伏尔加格勒公寓爆炸案造成240人死亡，数百人受伤
nodes.support_text: apartment blasts that killed about 240 people and aimed hundred others in Moscow and Volgodonsk in southern Russia in 1999

nodes.description: 调查确认Adam Dekkushev和Yusuf Crymshamhalov为爆炸案主犯，属Achemez Gochiyaev团伙
nodes.support_text: According to investigation results both were members of Achemez Gochiyaev’s gang, which was responsible for the blast, according to the court order.

nodes.description: Dekkushev于2002年4月14日通过俄格联合引渡程序被引渡至俄罗斯
nodes.support_text: Dekkushev was extradited to Russia on April 14, 2002, while Crymshamhalov on Dec. 7 following a special military operation in the Pankisi Gorge.

nodes.description: Crymshamhalov于2002年12月7日在格鲁吉亚潘基斯峡谷遭俄军特种行动逮捕
nodes.support_text: Crymshamhalov on Dec. 7 following a special military operation in the Pankisi Gorge.

nodes.description: 法院于2003年10月启动封闭审理，两被告仅部分认罪
nodes.support_text: The court hearing, which started last October, was closed to public.

nodes.description: 2004年1月11日法院判处两人终身监禁并强制赔偿受害者
nodes.support_text: have been sentenced to life term each in a special-regime colony. They will also have to pay compensations for material and moral damages.
Dekkushev and Crymshamhalov carried out torture and killing
Dekkushev and Crymshamhalov illegally crossed borders

edges.support_text: apartment blasts that killed about 240 people and aimed hundred others in Moscow and Volgodonsk in southern Russia in 1999
According to investigation results both were members of Achemez Gochiyaev’s gang, which was responsible for the blast, according to the court order.

According to investigation results both were members of Achemez Gochiyaev’s gang, which was responsible for the blast, according to the court order.
Dekkushev was extradited to Russia on April 14, 2002, while Crymshamhalov on Dec. 7 following a special military operation in the Pankisi Gorge.
The court hearing, which started last October, was closed to public.
